Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> fool proof way is to fully uninstall Agama (there should be an option when you are in the installer), then re-install

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> Hush is definitely supported by Agama, this issue happens a lot

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> There is also an #agama-wallet in KMD discord, those are the experts and they are very responsive in my experience

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> if you every upgrade Agama and coins are not available that you think should be, uninstalling and re-installing should fix it

Content:
[dscrd-hush] <Berg> @Moderator's and whoever it may concern :)
I'm putting together a Hush Notes kind of knowledge bank that admins and moderators alike can use to assist community members with ease, so we can collectively dump knowledge into one spot to help us each become more in-tune with everything :)
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1IgbqN7IBFJXCrZL16UlH0ecm5U5qsFdXrtWgRMwFxCI/edit?usp=sharing 
This link is "read only" right now, feel free to DM me with submissions just so things don't get messy.

Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> Very good news, I have fixed the last known issue with Hush dpow code, which means good things. I need to clean it up, merge it to dev branch, then notaries can update to it. And it will be included in our next release coming very soon

Content:
[dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> ```$ ./src/hush-cli getinfo
{
  "version": 1001450,
  "protocolversion": 170002,
  "walletversion": 60000,
  "balance": 7.99360000,
  "blocks": 386102,
  "timeoffset": 0,
  "connections": 8,
  "tls_connections": 2,
  "proxy": "",
  "difficulty": 108829946.1548191,
  "testnet": false,
  "keypoololdest": 1537032541,
  "keypoolsize": 101,
  "paytxfee": 0.00000000,
  "relayfee": 0.00000100,
  "errors": "",
  "notarizedhash": "000000032bf3b24aeae60b8ef312b06c25fabf08217f2e2ce44157441fac410f",

  "notarized": 386092

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> see all those amazing and beautiful notarized* fields in the output?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> those are new, part of KMD dpow, and they were not working correctly until I just spent 3 days debugging why

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> jl777, as usual, helped me debug until we isolated the issue. I made a mistake in porting some code from btc 0.15 to btc 0.11 style. It compiled, but didn't work correctly

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <Eddy O> :hush_white:

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> notarizations were kind of working before, the transactions were being made

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> but the nodes themselves couldn't see the data correctly, it was kind of weird. getinfo would return 0's for notarized stuff, but now it's happy
